verses.t: Brethren{G80}, my{G1699} heart's{G2588} desire{G2107} and{G2532} prayer{G3588} to{G4314} God{G3588} for{G5228} Israel{G2474} is{G2076}, that{G1519} they might be saved{G4991}.
For{G1063} I bear{G3140} them{G846} record{G3140} that{G3754} they have{G2192} a zeal{G2205} of God{G2316}, but{G235} not{G3756} according to{G2596} knowledge{G1922}.

For{G1063} they being ignorant of{G50} God's{G3588} righteousness{G1343}, and{G2532} going about{G2212} to establish{G2476} their own{G2398} righteousness{G1343}, have{G5293} not{G3756} submitted themselves{G5293} unto the righteousness{G3588} of God{G3588}.The Gk upetaghsan should really be tagged to "they… have… submitted themselves" but this would require a double split. I don't know how to resolve this so I've left the 'they' untagged for the moment.
For{G1063} Christ{G5547} is the end{G5056} of the law{G3551} for{G1519} righteousness{G1343} to every one{G3956} that believeth{G4100}.

For{G1063} Moses{G3475} describeth{G1125} the righteousness{G3588} which is{G3588} of{G1537} the law{G3588}, That{G3754} the man{G444} which doeth{G4160} those things{G846} shall live{G2198} by{G1722} them{G846}.

But{G1161} the righteousness{G1343} which is of{G1537} faith{G4102} speaketh{G3004} on this wise{G3779}, Say{G2036} not{G3361} in{G1722} thine{G4675} heart{G3588}, Who{G5101} shall ascend{G305} into{G1519} heaven{G3588}? (that{G5124} is{G2076}, to bring{G2609} Christ{G5547} down{G2609} from above:)
Or{G2228}, Who{G5101} shall descend{G2597} into{G1519} the deep{G3588}? (that{G5124} is{G2076}, to bring up{G321} Christ{G5547} again{G321} from{G1537} the dead{G3498}.)

But{G235} what{G5101} saith it{G3004}? The word{G3588} is{G2076} nigh{G1451} thee{G4675}, even in{G1722} thy{G4675} mouth{G3588}, and{G2532} in{G1722} thy{G4675} heart{G3588}: that{G5124} is{G2076}, the word{G3588} of faith{G3588}, which{G3739} we preach{G2784};

That{G3754} if{G1437} thou shalt confess{G3670} with{G1722} thy{G4675} mouth{G3588} the Lord{G2962} Jesus{G2424}, and{G2532} shalt believe{G4100} in{G1722} thine{G4675} heart{G3588} that{G3754} God{G3588} hath raised{G1453} him{G846} from{G1537} the dead{G3498}, thou shalt be saved{G4982}.
For{G1063} with the heart{G2588} man believeth{G4100} unto{G1519} righteousness{G1343}; and{G1161} with the mouth{G4750} confession is made{G3670} unto{G1519} salvation{G4991}.
For{G1063} the scripture{G3588} saith{G3004}, Whosoever{G3956} believeth{G4100} on{G1909} him{G846} shall{G2617} not{G3756}be ashamed{G2617}.

For{G1063} there is{G2076} no{G3756} difference{G1293} between{G5037} the Jew{G2453} and{G2532} the Greek{G1672}: for{G1063} the{G2962} same{G846} Lord{G2962} over all{G3956} is rich{G4147} unto{G1519} all{G3956} that call upon{G1941} him{G846}.
For{G1063} whosoever{G3956} shall call upon{G1941} the name{G3588} of the Lord{G2962} shall be saved{G4982}.

How{G4459} then{G3767} shall they call on him{G1941} in{G1519} whom{G3739} they have{G4100} not{G3756} believed{G4100}? and{G1161} how{G4459} shall they believe{G4100} in him of whom{G3739} they have{G191} not{G3756} heard{G191}? and{G1161} how{G4459} shall they hear{G191} without{G5565} a preacher{G2784}?

And{G1161} how{G4459} shall they preach{G2784}, except{G3361} they be sent{G649}? as{G2531} it is written{G1125}, How{G5613} beautiful{G5611} are the feet{G3588} of them that preach the gospel{G2097} of peace{G1515}, and bring glad tidings{G2097} of good things{G18}!
But{G235} they have{G5219} not{G3756} all{G3956} obeyed{G5219} the gospel{G3588}. For{G1063} Esaias{G2268} saith{G3004}, Lord{G2962}, who{G5101} hath believed{G4100} our{G2257} report{G3588}?
So then{G686} faith{G3588} cometh by{G1537} hearing{G189}, and{G1161} hearing{G189} by{G1223} the word{G4487} of God{G2316}.

But{G235} I say{G3004}, Have they{G191} not{G3756} heard{G191}? Yes verily{G3304}, their{G846} sound{G3588} went{G1831} into{G1519} all{G3956} the earth{G3588}, and{G2532} their{G846} words{G3588} unto{G1519} the ends{G3588} of the world{G3588}.

But{G235} I say{G3004}, Did{G1097} not{G3756} Israel{G2474} know{G1097}? First{G4413} Moses{G3475} saith{G3004}, I{G1473} will provoke{G3863} you{G5209} to jealousy{G3863} by{G1909} them that are no{G3756} people{G1484}, and by{G1909} a foolish{G801} nation{G1484} I will anger{G3949} you{G5209}.

But{G1161} Esaias{G2268} is very bold{G662}, and{G2532} saith{G3004}, I was found{G2147} of them{G3588} that sought{G2212} me{G1691} not{G3361}; I was made{G1096} manifest{G1717} unto them{G3588} that asked{G1905} not{G3361} after{G1905} me{G1691}.

But{G1161} to{G4314} Israel{G2474} he saith{G3004}, All{G3650} day long{G3588} I have stretched forth{G1600} my{G3450} hands{G3588} unto{G4314} a disobedient{G544} and{G2532} gainsaying{G483} people{G2992}.
